item.title: World Happiness EDA
item.description: TL;DR Wealth, social support, and life expectancy all seem to correlate strongly with happiness across countries. Generosity and corruption levels within a country do not, though data on these metrics is sparser and seems more prone to noisy and biased self-reporting. I used the World Happiness Report for all measures related to happiness, and the World Bank 2019 population data for country populations. World Happiness Report 2021 Data: https://www.kaggle.com/mathurinache/world-happiness-report-2021 World Bank 2019 Data: https://data.
